items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content: System.out.printf("%s %s ran OK for distance %s meters\n",type,name,distance);

items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content: System.out.printf("%s %s could not run for %s meters distance\n",type,name,distance);

items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content: System.out.printf("%s %s jumped OK at height %s meters\n",type,name,height);

items.description: Format string should use %n rather than \n
items.line_content: System.out.printf("%s %s could not jump at height %s meters\n",type,name,height);
